# f5xc_namespace (Data Source)

Fetches information about an existing namespace in F5 Distributed Cloud.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Name of the namespace to look up.

### Read-Only

- `description` (String) Description of the namespace.
- `id` (String) Unique identifier for the namespace.
- `labels` (Map of String) Labels applied to the namespace.
